mapper.insert: INSERT INTO offline_pay_product ( offline_pay_product_id, offline_pay_history_id, product_id, name, price, amount, created_at ) VALUES ( seq_offline_pay_product.NEXTVAL, #{offlinePayHistoryId}, #{productId}, #{name}, #{price}, #{amount}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT offline_pay_product_id AS offlineProductId, offline_pay_history_id AS offlineShopId, name, price FROM offline_pay_product WHERE offline_pay_history_id = #{offlinePayHistoryId} ORDER BY offline_pay_product_id
